channel.title: Funny - Digg
channel.description: Funny on Digg: the best articles, videos, tweets, and original content that the web is talking about right now

item.title: Teens Are Completed Flabbergasted By The Challenge To Dial A Rotary Phone
item.description: You'd think it wouldn't be this hard. You would be wrong.

item.title: Man Tests Out How Many Rubber Bands Can Make A Watermelon Explode And The Result Is Glorious
item.description: Who needs to use a knife to slice open a watermelon when you can make one explode with many, many rubber bands?

item.title: Students From A Stunt Double School Take Turns 'Punching' Each Other In Ingenious Video
item.description: Just because you have to respect the rules of social distancing doesn't mean you can't knock each other out.

item.title: Trump Impersonator Thinks He's Figured Out Who's Responsible For The Lockdown Crisis
item.description: Is Zoom behind the coronavirus lockdowns? Trump has a theory.

item.title: A Runaway Pig Was Chased By Stamford Police Officers For 45 Minutes, Until It Was Captured. Here Are The Highlights
item.description: At one point, a police officer proclaimed it "a stand-off."

item.title: This Is What Happens When A Dog Doesn't Keep A Social Distance Away From A Cat
item.description: Just because the cat is smaller doesn't mean that the dog has the upper hand in the relationship.

item.title: Here's A Brilliant Parody Of Every Introvert's Reaction To The Coronavirus
item.description: "I guess I feel very sorry for extroverts right now. They must be struggling, unlike me."

item.title: TV Reporter Accidentally Films A Very NSFW Segment On Live TV
item.description: Here's another unexpected outcome of working from home: sometimes when you're filming live segments in your bathroom, your naked spouse might also be in the shot.

item.title: This Dog Is Extremely Confused By The Missing Glass In Glass Door
item.description: Sometimes the glass is not a material obstacle but a state of mind.

item.title: Man Provides Hilarious Commentary Of Video Of A Cow Being Rescued From A Pool
item.description: It's not every day that we see a video of a cow being chased into a pool by dogs and then being rescued by cowboys.

item.title: Dog And Cat Handle The Increasingly Complicated Obstacle Course Their Owner Set Very Differently
item.description: Cats will be cats. Dogs will be dogs.

item.title: Here's A Perfect Encapsulation Of What Every Facebook Video Looks Like These Days
item.description: From the music to the captions, this is pitch perfect.

item.title: Comedians Brilliantly Lampoon Bon Appétit's 'Gourmet Makes' By Attempting To Make Gourmet Four Loko
item.description: An absolutely spot on impression of Claire and Bon Appétit's shtick on YouTube.

item.title: This YouTuber Just Built A Mechanic Parent That Says Its Proud Of You If You Pay 25 Cents
item.description: The lengths we go for validation. Drop in 25 cents for a "pat on the back."

item.title: This Guy Discovering Aliens That Look Just Like Himself Might Be The Best TikTok Ever Made
item.description: This TikTok by Jeff Wright utilizing Parent Trap film technology and a science fiction premise keeps getting better and better the longer you watch.

item.title: Music Teacher Creates A Soothing Song About COVID-19 That Is Not Blood-Curdling At All
item.description: During times of stress and hardship, we really need songs like this to help us manage our emotions.
item.kicker: LOWER YOUR VOLUME FOR THIS ONE

item.title: Parents, If Your Kids Say They're Bored Have 'Em Push This Big Fun Button
item.description: Colorado's stay-at-home order has been in place since March 26 and as the parents at Colorado Public Radio can attest, the youth are getting a bit... restless.

item.title: This Little Girl From Australia Pretty Much Sums Up How We're All Feeling Right Now
item.description: Dan Andrews, the premiere of Victoria, spoke to a few youngsters over Zoom and one had a keen takeaway from what we're all going through.

item.title: Cat Has Some Deep Regrets After Getting Stuck Inside This Vase
item.description: A cat realizes its curiosity has gotten the best of it.

item.title: This Cat, Staring Longingly Outside A Fence, Is Clearly Plotting Something
item.description: A cat was spotted in Brazil making a very unusual pose.

item.title: Man Tries To Scare Mouse From Under Refrigerator, Gets Some Instant Karma
item.description: A Russian man tried to scare a mouse but ended up getting the tables turned on him.

item.title: 'He Got Through A Locked Door!' — Reporter's Son Hilariously Interrupts Live TV Interview
item.description: Joe Eskenazi found out that live television can be unpredictable.

item.title: This Dog Tries To Eat Every Car That Passes On The Highway
item.description: Some dogs demonstrate an innate ability to want to eat everything they see. Kierra Wilson witnessed this behavior in her adorably quirky Border Collie while out on the road, which she shared on TikTok for our amusement.

item.title: The American Health Care System In A Nutshell
item.description: A short but succinct distillation of going to the doctor in the United States.
item.kicker: THIS JUST ABOUT SUMS IT UP

item.title: These Dinner Guests Were Warned Not To Fill Up On Cheese, And Now They'll Have To Face The Consequences
item.description: Zach and Mark disobey orders from the chef not to fill up on cheese in this hilariously intense short film.

item.title: Sh*t That Fitness Influencers Always Say
item.description: JP Sears does a hilarious impression of all those buffed out fitness Influencers that ostensibly are giving workout inspiration, while mostly being self-aggrandizing.
item.kicker: 'IT'S NOT NARCISSISM IF IT'S ALSO INSPIRATION'

item.title: Duck Chases Owner Only To Act All Nonchalant When Owner Realizes What It's Doing
item.description: Here's what it looks like when a duck tries to play hard-to-get.

item.title: The World's Laziest Corgi Brilliantly Found A Way To Turn A Roomba Into A Belly Massager
item.description: This dog found a way to trap a Roomba into being its personal belly rub machine.

item.title: This Guy Wrote A Hilarious Beach Boys Parody Tribute To His Sister Trapped On A Cruise Ship During The Coronavirus Pandemic
item.description: Jeremy Kreuzer got his family to participate in a parody of the Beach Boys' "Sloop John B" dedicated to his sister, a cruise performer, who's still stuck on the boat.

item.title: 'Cats' Is Even More Bonkers When You Watch It With The Audio Description Track On Blu-Ray
item.description: Whoever had to do this job, explaining what was happening on screen visually for the "Cats" movie, we salute you and we hope you're okay.

item.title: The Performance Of A $40 Yeti-Brand Plastic Bucket Compared With A Generic Plastic Bucket You'd Get At A Hardware Store
item.description: A YouTuber puts two buckets through the ringer and observes whether the Yeti brand bucket is worth the investment.

item.title: What If Google Was A Guy, The Quarantine Edition
item.description: College Humor is back with their popular series — this time, in a post-coronavirus world.

item.title: BBC Weatherman Closes Off His Forecast With Unexpected Drum Cover Of BBC's Outro Music
item.description: It's cloudy with 100% chance of a drum solo in the afternoon.

item.title: Someone Sweded The Cinderella Castle Intro To Disney Movies Without Knowing How To Paint Or Play Piano
item.description: Liam Thompson recreates the iconic Disney intro with a little hard work and imagination.
item.kicker: FATE STEPS IN AND SEES YOU THROUGH

item.title: We Can't Believe This Quibi Show Starring Rachel Brosnahan As A Woman Obsessed With Her Golden Arm Is Actually Real
item.description: Many of the Quibi shows that have come out seem pretty insane in terms of its premises, but we are still having a hard time not seeing this as a parody.

item.title: Yorkshire Terrier Steals Candy Teeth, Hilarity Ensues
item.description: Thomas the terrier got a hold of some candy teeth and it's an amusing sight to see.

item.title: Watch Old Hollywood Stars Swear — A Lot — In Hilarious Bloopers From Classic Films
item.description: We tend to think of old Hollywood stars as elegant and glamorized and refined — but turns out many had quite a potty mouth.

item.title: Watch Old Hollywood Stars Swear — A Lot — In Hilarious Bloopers From Classic Films
item.description: We tend to think of old Hollywood stars as elegant and glamorized and refined — but turns out many had quite a potty mouth.

item.title: Instead Of Going Outside, Woman And Dog Have Hit Upon The Most Relaxing Way To Play Catch
item.description: The best way to exercise is to do so is horizontally.

item.title: The Honest Trailer For 'Cats' Reminds Us How Truly Deranged The Movie Was
item.description: Once upon a time in 2019, there was this really batsh*t crazy movie called "Cats" — remember that?

item.title: The Comedic Timing On This Doorbell Cam Footage Of A Delivery Guy Realizing His Van Is Rolling Away Is Just Perfect
item.description: This is like a comedic sketch come to life.

item.title: Dog Walker Finds Clever Way To Stay Safe When Out-And-About In The Neighborhood
item.description: Just a typical day in Nashua, New Hampshire.

item.title: Woman Tries To Explain The Pandemic To Her Past Self In This Hilarious Short
item.description:
– "I think the Australian wildfires are gonna be the defining feature of 2020."

– "Yeah… not even a little bit."

item.title: This Boy Really Couldn't Care Less About Practicing Tennis With His Tennis Coach Dad
item.description: The ultimate baller move is to just not give a f*ck.

item.title: Banned Personalized License Plates
item.description: Vanity license plates can be fun, but be aware the Department of Motor Vehicles does not take kindly to requests for BIGFART and DAPOOP.

item.title: Comedian Nails Impression Of That Friend Who Thinks They Might Have Already Had Coronavirus
item.description: To be honest, this is how everyone of us is like now.

item.title: Here's A Hilarious Cut Of Misheard Pop Song Lyrics That All Center Around Food
item.description: And now that we've heard this, we can never un-hear it again.

item.title: We're Sorry, But We Can't Stop Laughing At This Video Of A Dog Pile-Driving A Kid During His Easter Egg Hunt
item.description: Easter egg hunts have never been this high-stakes.

item.title: This Parody Of 'Every Party In San Francisco' Is Savage
item.description: While this hypothetical party does seem insufferable, what we wouldn't give to casually gather in a room with 25 other people right now.

item.title: Let A Star Cast Of Actors Help You Brush Up On British Slang
item.description: Learn all the British, Scottish and Welsh "ism's" from Rachel Weisz, Simon Pegg, Emma Thompson and so many others.
